query.prompt:
For each row in the table, choose the word from columns 2-7 that most closely resembles the word in column 1. In the "Derived" column, fill the language name. In the "Etymology" column, fill the word. French is the first priority, and if none of the words are similar, look for similar words from French, and if not, leave it blank.
| Esperanto | French | Latin | English | German | Italian | Ancient Greek | Derived | Etymology | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | en | en | in | in | in | in | ἐν | | | | la | le | ille | the | der | il | ὁ, ἡ, τό | | | | mezo | milieu | medius | middle | Mitte | mezzo | μέσος | | | | de | de | de | of | von | di | ἐκ, ἀπό | | | | la | le | ille | the | der | il | ὁ, ἡ, τό | | | | vojo | voie | via | way | Weg | via | ὁδός | | | | de | de | de | of | von | di | ἐκ, ἀπό | | | | nia | notre | noster | our | unser | nostro | ἡμέτερος | | | | vivo | vie | vita | life | Leben | vita | βίος | | | | mi | je | ego | I | ich | io | ἐγώ | | | | trovi | trouver | invenio | find | finden | trovare | εὑρίσκω | | | | mi | je | ego | I | ich | io | ἐγώ | | | | en | en | in | in | in | in | ἐν | | | | malluma | sombre | obscurus | dark | dunkel | scuro | σκοτεινός | | | | arbaro | forêt | silva | forest | Wald | foresta | δρυμός | | | | ĉar | parce que | quia | because | weil | perché | ὅτι | | | | la | le | ille | the | der | il | ὁ, ἡ, τό | | | | rekta | droit | rectus | straight | gerade | retto | εὐθύς | | | | vojo | voie | via | way | Weg | via | ὁδός | | | | esti | être | esse | is | sein | essere | εἶναι | | | | perdita | perdu | perditus | lost | verloren | perduto | ἀπολωλώς | | |
